meanings.definition: An instrument in a vehicle that measures and displays the speed at which the vehicle is traveling.
meanings.sent1: The speedometer in the car showed we were going 60 miles per hour.
meanings.sent2: I always check the speedometer to make sure I'm not driving too fast.
meanings.sent3: The speedometer decided to take a break and stopped working on our road trip.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a broken speedometer, uncontrollable and infectious.
meanings.sent5: The speedometer needle danced wildly as the car raced down the highway.
